Methods in com.threerings.presents.server that return types with arguments of type ClientResolver
abstract  java.lang.Class<? extends ClientResolver> SessionFactory.getClientResolverClass(Name username)
          Returns the ClientResolver derived class to use to resolve a client with the specified username or null if this factory does not handle clients of the supplied type.
